burlap.behavior.singleagent.learning

Class LearningAgent.LearningAgentBookKeeping

  • java.lang.Object
    • burlap.behavior.singleagent.learning.LearningAgent.LearningAgentBookKeeping
  • Enclosing interface:
    LearningAgent

    public static class LearningAgent.LearningAgentBookKeeping
extends java.lang.Object
    Because LearningAgent is an interface, default methods for managing the history of experienced episodes is not provided. Therefore, this class provides the requisite data members and default methods for making that bookkeeping easy. This allows a class that implements the LearningAgent interface to simply have a data member for this class and allow it to manage the methods. All data members of this class are public. By default the history of learning episodes stored will be just 1. This method also includes a data member maxEpisodeSize which can be optionally used for setting the longest time a learning agent will run when the LearningAgent.runLearningEpisodeFrom(burlap.oomdp.core.State) method is called. By default, it is INT MAX. The class also has a method for automatically adding an episode to its history, will removing the oldest stored episode if the the size of the history is larger than the max history size.

      • getLastLearningEpisode

        public EpisodeAnalysis getLastLearningEpisode()
        Returns the last learning episode of the agent.
        Returns:

      • setNumEpisodesToStore

        public void setNumEpisodesToStore(int numEps)
        Tells the agent how many EpisodeAnalysis objects representing learning episodes to internally store. For instance, if the number of set to 5, then the agent should remember the save the last 5 learning episodes. Note that this number has nothing to do with how learning is performed; it is purely for performance gathering.
        Parameters:
        numEps - the number of learning episodes to remember.

      • getAllStoredLearningEpisodes

        public java.util.List<EpisodeAnalysis> getAllStoredLearningEpisodes()
        Returns all saved EpisodeAnalysis objects of which the agent has kept track.
        Returns:
        all saved EpisodeAnalysis objects of which the agent has kept track.

      • offerEpisodeToHistory

        public void offerEpisodeToHistory(EpisodeAnalysis ea)
        Adds episode ea to this objects history of experienced episodes. If the current size of all episodes stored is equal to the number of episodes this object is supposed to store, it first removes the oldest episodes added before adding ea.
        Parameters:
        ea - the episode to add to the history of experienced episodes.
